messages.title: HENRY VANN
messages.content: Leading the fight against the Conservatives' hard Brexit. The election on 8th June is your chance to change the country. A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket across the country, with the poorest families hit hardest. We need to protect jobs, by keeping Britain in the single market and have a real alternative to the Conservatives. Only the Liberal Democrats are challenging the Conservatives over their hard Brexit plans. Only a Liberal Democrat vote can get real change for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Henry Vann and Lib Dems will always be on the side of Bedford Hospital. Under Lib Dem plans Bedford hospital will be properly funded, and services will be saved.
Our local schools are under threat. Henry Vann is fighting school cuts. Henry said 'I am standing up for all our schools. They are underfunded and that is a scandal that impacts local children.'
Lib Dems are the only party challenging the Conservatives' hard Brexit agenda. Henry Vann and the Lib Dems will make sure we get the best Brexit deal.

issues.brexitEurope: A disastrous hard Brexit will hit people in the pocket across the country, with the poorest families hit hardest. We need to protect jobs, by keeping Britain in the single market and have a real alternative to the Conservatives.
issues.education: Our local schools are under threat. Henry Vann is fighting school cuts. Henry said 'I am standing up for all our schools. They are underfunded and that is a scandal that impacts local children.'
issues.health: Henry Vann said 'Local people are being let down by the Conservatives, and as your MP I will always stand up for our hospital. We need the NHS services we deserve.' 'Our hospital is a vital lifeline, but the Conservatives have vandalized our NHS.'

endorsements.endorser: Dave Hodgson, Liberal Democrat Elected Mayor of Bedford
endorsements.endorsement: Henry has shown that he works hard and gets results for our area, such as his work to improve education locally.
